__e: I was wrong to doubt you before, and I shall not again.
But remember, they'll say anything to make you doubt yourself.
I will talk about this with you if you want, but if you're doubting yourself, I can't indulge that.
You don't know me well enough to doubt me.
What could so stagger your esteem for me now?
We kept going back and forth and I tried to stick with what we had talked about, but then I started second-guessing myself.
"In order to determine "whether there is anything we can know with certainty, We first have to doubt everything we know."
"In order to determine whether there is anything "we can know with certainty, We first have to doubt everything we know."
If there is one thing that we can all agree on, it's that my brother has never given us a reason to doubt him.
